client_profile: Couple looking to buy an apartment in Brussels with a budget of 490000–895000 EUR. Priorities include cafes, expat community, and value for money.
must_have: Proximity to cafes and brunch spots
nice_to_have: Access to parks and green spaces
red_flags: High property taxes in certain areas
Noise from nearby bars or restaurants
contradictions: Value for money vs. premium locations
Access to cafes vs. quiet neighborhoods

top_districts.name: Ixelles
why: Home to lively neighborhoods and abundant cafes, ideal for brunch and socializing.
Strong expat community with English-speaking services along Avenue Louise.
watch_out: Property prices can exceed budget, especially near main attractions.

top_districts.name: Saint-Gilles
why: Offers a multicultural vibe with many brunch options near Parvis de Saint-Gilles.
Walking distance to key transport links, facilitating easy commuting.
watch_out: Renovation projects can affect property prices and timelines.

top_districts.name: Etterbeek
why: Features numerous parks, great for outdoor cafes and leisure activities.
Close proximity to European institutions, attracting international residents.
watch_out: Commute time can increase during rush hours due to traffic.

real_estate_sites.name: ImmoWeb
real_estate_sites.note: Popular site for property listings in Belgium.

real_estate_sites.name: Logic-Immo
real_estate_sites.note: Wide selection of real estate options.

agencies.name: Engel & Völkers
agencies.note: Premium real estate agency in Brussels.

agencies.name: BIM
agencies.note: Local expertise in various Brussels neighborhoods.

questions_for_agent_landlord: What is the total deposit required and any additional fees?
Are utilities included in the monthly rent or paid separately?
What are the terms for lease termination or renewal?
Are there any rules regarding noise or shared spaces?
How is rent indexed or registered?
next_steps: Schedule meetings with real estate agents.
Review financial preparedness and mortgage options.
clarifying_questions: What is your preferred living style?
Are you open to fixer-upper apartments?
How soon do you want to move?
